title: What was Queen's first hit single? - Quora

response.answer_text: The first single that started to get them attention was Seven Seas of Rhye - A lot of people mistakenly claim Killer Queen was their first hit, however, this would actually go to Seven Seas of Rhye, which was a top 10 single and was performed on Top of the Pops in February 1974.

According to Wikipedia in the UK - their 1st single was “Keep yourself alive” in 1973 while their 1st major hit was “Killer Queen” which reached no 2 in 1974 . Their 1st No 1 was “Bohemian Rhapspody” in 1975
